data.title: Compare College Prep at Florida Private High Schools
data.meta_description: Compare college prep at Florida private high schools based on SAT/ACT scores, graduation rates, and popular colleges.
data.text:
#1 Best College Prep Private High Schools in Florida .

Crimson Global Academy, USA

Blue checkmark.

Online School ,

FL ,

6-12 ,

70 Niche users give it an average review of 4.7 stars.

Featured Review: Senior says I am a rising senior at CGA US, and I am thoroughly enjoying my experience studying here! My previous online school did not have the structure, academic rigor, and opportunity to connect with peers... I found that one of the biggest strengths this school has is their support system. While they provide a schedule that keeps you productive throughout the week, the teachers are very understanding... I love all the teachers and friends I've met during my time at CGA, and would highly recommend becoming a student here if you're looking for an online school that truly cares about you and your... .
